title: 278: OCCASIONALLY -- Halloween 2022
itunes:title: OCCASIONALLY -- Halloween 2022
description: In a tip o’ the hat to the occasion, Mike delivers a dramatic recitation of one of his very favorite poems, The Cremation of Sam McGee by Robert Service.  Happy Halloween!
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
